org.hibernate.search.indexes.impl

Class IndexManagerHolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.indexes.impl.IndexManagerHolder

  • public class IndexManagerHolder
extends Object
    Stores references to IndexManager instances, and starts or stops them. Starting IndexManagers happens by creating new EntityIndexBinder instances. IndexManagers are started successively as they are needed (for example based on the sharding strategy). Stopping IndexManagers can currently only happen all at once.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard, Sylvain Vieujot, Hardy Ferentschik, Sanne Grinovero
